Text: ICAPUCAP Certification writes to the NYISOTECHEXCHANGE Discussion List By October Midnight all Suppliers LSEs and Marketers must certify their November UCAP activity The ISO may impose a sanction for failure to certify Bob Boyle

ICAPUCAP formsDear Market Participant In the interest of not flooding the webmaster with constant changes new PTIDs or new participant names to the UCAP forms Certification Bid Forms and Offer Forms I will be updating the forms about once per month Since you will need a methodology to work around missing information the new forms have codes that will allow you to enter undefined PTIDs and undefined new participants PTID number is used for a resource that has not been assigned a number NewLSE is used for a new Load Serving Entity that has not been assigned a Registrant Name NewSuppl is used for a new Supplier that has not been assigned a Registrant Name NOTE that if you use any of the above you must describe your intentions in the comments cell of the form being submitted Other Changes ISOSu is the prefix for sales or purchases that occurred as a result of NYISO transactions during the supplemental process The supplemental process is implemented when there is insufficient UCAP available within a location and the NYISO must purchase UCAP from outside the location where the shortage has occurred to meet the NYCA reliability requirements PTID numbers to be used when identifying UCAP purchased through the NYISO auction have been assigned The PTID numbers range from to and are related to auctions or the supplemental processes For example a participant who is selling UCAP that was previously purchased in the summer strip auction would enter PTID number on the Offer form when selling into a subsequent ISO auction A list of PTID numbers is now available on the instruction page of the auction Offer forms Reminder When identifying an ISO auction please remember that you must think in terms of the procurement period for the first auction month when the transaction took place For example on May the auction for the upcoming months of June through October MW were transacted for the months of June and August The auction reference that you will use for both the June and August transactions are ISOMoJun The same auction reference would be used if on May the transactions were for August and September When completing the Certification Form do not net transactions Lets say that you are awarded MW from the Strip Auction and later move purchase or sell MW through a bilateral Your entries on the form would show the MW strip auction transaction on one line and your second line would show the MW bilateral transaction You can not use a value of MW on one line Each and Every Month you must submit your certification form Regards Bob Boyle See attached file Certification Form ICAPUCAP Certification writes to the NYISOTECHEXCHANGE Discussion List By October Midnight all Suppliers LSEs and Marketers must certify their November UCAP activity The ISO may impose a sanction for failure to certify Bob Boyle

Announcement Initial Autumn TCC Auction Round writes to the NYISOTECHEXCHANGE Discussion List The rescheduling of the October Reconfiguration Auction of TCCs due to the events of September th has produced some unanticipated consequences The NYISO will not be able to post the results of Round of the Initial Autumn TCC Auction as scheduled The results of Round will be posted by noon on Monday September The Bidding Period for Round of the auction will commence on Tuesday September at AM and continue to PM Eastern Standard Time The Bidding Period has been extended to provide auction participants additional time to assess their Bidding strategy The remainder of the schedule for the Initial Autumn TCC Auction is unchanged

ICAPUCAP Certification writes to the NYISOTECHEXCHANGE Discussion List By October Midnight all Suppliers LSEs and Marketers must certify their November UCAP activity The ISO may impose a sanction for failure to certify Bob Boyle

ICAPUCAP New procedure for Certification and updated formBob Boyle Forwarded by Robert BoyleNYISO on PM Robert Boyle To Market YISO cc PM Subject ICAPUCAP New procedure for Certification and updated form Due to the large number of interpretations regarding the guidelines for completing and submitting the UCAP Certification form the following is designed to reduce confusion and to bring uniformity to the certification process All participants in the UCAP market who have had any purchase or sale activity must submit a certification All transactions including ISO auctions must be recorded on the certification form The ISO will validate your reported auction transactions If you report activity in any month you must continue reporting until the end of the Winter or Summer capability period Bilaterals transacted after the certification date for the reportable month will not be recognized by the ISO The ISO is are now changing the methodology for the recording of sales The following procedure must be followed by a Supplier who physically owns capacity and does not serve a load a The Supplier will report all UCAP sold by PTID as a purchase with positive values to themselves Do not report more UCAP than was sold b The Supplier will report all UCAP sold to OTHERS without denoting PTIDs as negative values The following procedure must be followed by a Supplier who physically owns capacity and does serve a load or an LSE who selfsupplies from its own resources ie SCR a The Supplier will report all UCAP sold by PTID as a purchase with positive values to themselves Do not report more UCAP than was sold to OTHERS and claimed for selfsupply b The Supplier will report all UCAP sold to OTHERS without denoting PTIDs as negative values c The Supplier will not report the sale of UCAP to itself these sales have been included in step a above The following procedure must be followed by Load Serving Entities a the LSE will not identify PTIDs b the LSE will report purchases as positive values c the LSE will report sales as negative values Attached are three sample certifications and one blank certification Sample A Supplier with MW of UCAP sold MWs to the NYISO in the December monthly auction This Supplier has not sold MW of the available Sample A SupplierLSE with MW of UCAP available to sell sold MW to a new LSE kept for its own needs and purchased from an a new supplier to meet its MW UCAP requirement This SupplierLSE has not sold MW of the available Sample A LSE with a MW requirement purchases all its UCAP from two sources Bob Boyle See attached file Certification FormVxlsSee attached file Certification FormV Sample xlsSee attached file Certification FormV Sample xlsSee attached file Certification FormVxls Certification FormVxls Certification FormV Sample xls Certification FormV Sample xls Certification FormVxls

New Certification FormAs part of our on going effort to streamline the ICAP process we are implementing a new method and form for the monthly ICAP certification process Starting with the August certification date please use the attached form Both Suppliers and LSEs will use the same form thus eliminating two forms for those who buy and sell ICAP Also the forms will not longer be faxed to our office We are requiring that you password protect the workbook and email it to us Your password will be the same one you are currently using for bid and offer forms If you do not have a password please contact Serena Barrett or myself and one will be issued to you It is important that you read the legal page in the workbook Please review the workbook spreadsheet List Page and find your companys character registrant name If you do not find your company or the name of a company you do ICAP business with please contact me Starting with the winter strip auction your character registrant name will also be your new registrant name for bid and offer forms Attached are three workbooks The one you will use monthly is blank and ready for use The other two were developed as examples to answer your basic questions Please contact me by email if you have any questions Regards Bob Boyle See attached file Certification Form xlsSee attached file Sample LSEs Certification Form xlsSee attached file Sample Suppliers Certification Form xls Certification Form xls Sample LSEs Certification Form xls Sample Suppliers Certification Form xls

New Certification FormThe first revision to the ICAP Certification form is attached The only change was to the email address it is now Regards Bob Boyle See attached file Certification Form xls Certification Form xls

Reminder that the DMNC testing for Summer is nearing an end September writes to the NYISOTECHEXCHANGE Discussion List Section of the ICAP manual states that the DMNC testing period for the summer capability period will end on September If you have not performed a DMNC test time is running out Bob Boyle

ICAP Attachment A writes to the NYISOTECHEXCHANGE Discussion List After reviewing the dates in Attachment A of the ICAP manual I noticed that there is not enough time between various obligation dates to process information Below are the changes that are needed Topic Original Date New Date Deficiency Auction Post Results Certifications Deficiency Auction Post Results Regards Bob Boyle

New ICAP Certification writes to the NYISOTECHEXCHANGE Discussion List The new and revised ICAP Certification form can now be found on the NYISO website The form is located at marketsicapinfohtmlsummer page under certification forms
